short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Money counter helps you count your money. Add the number of bills and coins  to calculate their total value.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the number of bills and coins you have in various designations to calculate their total value.
